name: Ghost to the Grave
description:
Keep the ghosts from escaping their graves. This game was initially started for some Halloween-themed game jams and then finally brought to completion for "Finish Your Game" Jam 2020.

Special thanks to Isaac Poole for the awesome original music and sound effects.

Tips:

  • Try prioritizing which ghosts to attack first -- faster ghosts are easier to push down, but slow ghosts are harder to manage the higher up they get.
  • When a ghost is pushed below the ground, it will respawn with a different speed.
  • Sometimes it is worth it to push a ghost below ground so there will be some lead time before it spawns, again. Other times it is better to keep a slow ghost occupying a lane than to risk it coming back faster.
  • Watch out for the cool-down period after a beam's energy is fully depleted.
  • Ghosts that go past the top of the screen can still be caught if they have not gone too far.
  • The A/S/D keys can be used in place of LEFT/DOWN/RIGHT.
